title: health endpoint responds with an error
body:
```bash
$ curl localhost:9102/debug/metrics/version
SUCCESS
3
2.45.1-stable
29f8e97cf7adc0210191a7081ec288cd8aca34b1

$ curl localhost:8545/health
{"check_block":"DISABLED","healthcheck_query":"ERROR: unexpected end of JSON input","min_peer_count":"DISABLED"}

$ curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_syncing","params":[],"id":67}' localhost:8545
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":67,"result":{"currentBlock":"0x0","highestBlock":"0x0","stages":[{"stage_name":"Snapshots","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"Headers","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"BlockHashes","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"Bodies","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"Senders","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"Execution","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"Translation","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"HashState","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"IntermediateHashes","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"AccountHistoryIndex","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"StorageHistoryIndex","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"LogIndex","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"CallTraces","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"TxLookup","block_number":"0x0"},{"stage_name":"Finish","block_number":"0x0"}]}}
```
